Title: Docker based Rust project builds.
Description: My workstation runs Arch Linux while my servers are mostly Debian. I prefer to not build Rust projects on the servers themselves so have been working on a simple automated Docker based build system. This allows me to build on my workstation. This screen cast shows a build. At the moment the build product is an ELF binary though I'll eventually produce a deb file. I'll blog about this one day.
